title: Pork and sesame noodle soup

For the soup: 100g/3½oz pork tenderloin, cut into cubes, seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan over a medium heat, add the seasoned pork and fry, stirring frequently, for 2-3 minutes, or until beginning to brown on all sides. Add the garlic and chilli and cook for a further 1-2 minutes.
Add the chicken stock, noodles and cabbage and bring to the boil. Boil until the noodles have softened and the pork is completely cooked through.
To serve, pour the soup into a bowl and drizzle with soy sauce and sesame oil.
